title: S&P 500, Dow Dip in Afternoon Trading

text: Not a good day for markets today, but not a terribly bad one either.Stocks were down almost across the board on Friday, with the S&P 500 down 0.1%, the Dow Jones Industrial Average down 0.5%, and the Nasdaq Composite flat.The Russell 2000, the index capturing performance of companies with smaller market capitalizations, is down 0.5%. Most of these indexes have spent the majority of Friday's trading session below the breakeven line marking tiny losses.
html:
Not a good day for markets today, but not a terribly bad one either.

Stocks were down almost across the board on Friday, with the S&P 500 down 0.1%, the Dow Jones Industrial Average down 0.5%, and the Nasdaq Composite flat.

The Russell 2000, the index capturing performance of companies with smaller market capitalizations, is down 0.5%. Most of these indexes have spent the majority of Friday's trading session below the breakeven line marking tiny losses.
